1:null
8:Te83,drfdffffdf<span style="background-color: hsl(var(--background));">"use client";</span><div>import dynamic from "next/dynamic";</div><div>import { useState, useEffect } from "react";</div><div>import { useRouter } from "next/navigation";</div><div>import { useAuthState } from "react-firebase-hooks/auth";</div><div>import { auth, db } from "@/firebase/firebaseConfig";</div><div>import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button";</div><div>import Spinner from "@/components/Spinner";</div><div>import { addDoc, collection } from "firebase/firestore";</div><div>import { EditorProvider } from "react-simple-wysiwyg"; // EditorProvider'Ä± import et</div><div><br></div><div>const Editor = dynamic(</div><div>&nbsp; () =&gt; import("react-simple-wysiwyg").then((mod) =&gt; mod.Editor),</div><div>&nbsp; { ssr: false }</div><div>);</div><div><br></div><div>import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input";</div><div><br></div><div>function WritePage() {</div><div>&nbsp; const [title, setTitle] = useState&lt;string&gt;("");</div><div>&nbsp; const [content, setContent] = useState&lt;string&gt;("");</div><div>&nbsp; const [user, loading] = useAuthState(auth);</div><div>&nbsp; const router = useRouter();</div><div><br></div><div>&nbsp; useEffect(() =&gt; {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; if (!user &amp;&amp; !loading) {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; router.push("/login");</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; }</div><div>&nbsp; }, [user, loading, router]);</div><div><br></div><div>&nbsp; if (loading) return &lt;Spinner /&gt;;</div><div><br></div><div>&nbsp; const savePost = async () =&gt; {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; try {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; const blogPost = await addDoc(collection(db, "blogs"), {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; title: title,</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; date: new Date(),</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; content: content,</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; });</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; console.log("Post saved with ID:", blogPost.id);</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; } catch (error) {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; console.error("Error saving post:", error);</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; } finally {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; setContent("");</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; setTitle("");</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; }</div><div>&nbsp; };</div><div><br></div><div>&nbsp; function onChange(e: any) {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; setContent(e.target.value);</div><div>&nbsp; }</div><div><br></div><div>&nbsp; return (</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;div className="p-10"&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Input</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; placeholder="Blog Title"</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; value={title}</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; onChange={(e) =&gt; setTitle(e.target.value)}</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;div className="mt-3"&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;EditorProvider&gt; {/* EditorProvider ile sar */}</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Editor value={content} onChange={onChange} /&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/EditorProvider&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;div className="flex items-center justify-end mt-10"&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Button variant="secondary" onClick={savePost}&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Save Post</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/Button&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; );</div><div>}</div><div><br></div><div>export default WritePage;</div><div><br></div>2:["$","div",null,{"className":"container mx-auto p-4","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-center text-3xl font-bold mb-4","children":"sds"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-center text-gray-500 mb-4","children":"Wed Aug 07 2024"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$8"}}]]}]
